mapper.select: SELECT comId, comName, comLogo, cs.stuId, stuName, custId, custName, custLogo, chatId, word, DATE_FORMAT(dateTime, "%Y/%c/%e %r") dateTime FROM (SELECT c.com_id comId, c.name comName, c.logo_img comLogo, s.stu_id stuId, s.name stuName FROM company c, studio s WHERE c.com_id=#{comId} AND c.com_id = s.com_id) cs, (SELECT cu.cust_id custId, cu.nickname custName, cu.img_src custLogo, ch.chat_id chatId, ch.stu_id stuId, ch.word word, ch.date_time dateTime FROM (SELECT * FROM customer) cu, (SELECT * FROM chat WHERE date_time IN (SELECT MAX(date_time) FROM chat WHERE sender = 0 GROUP BY cust_id, stu_id)) ch WHERE cu.cust_id=ch.cust_id) cuh WHERE cs.stuId = cuh.stuId ORDER BY cuh.dateTime DESC;

SELECT comId, comName, comLogo, cs.stuId, stuName, custId, custName, custLogo, chatId, word, DATE_FORMAT(dateTime, "%Y/%c/%e %r") dateTime FROM (SELECT c.com_id comId, c.name comName, c.logo_img comLogo, s.stu_id stuId, s.name stuName FROM company c, studio s WHERE c.com_id = s.com_id) cs, (SELECT cu.cust_id custId, cu.nickname custName, cu.img_src custLogo, ch.chat_id chatId, ch.stu_id stuId, ch.word word, ch.date_time dateTime FROM (SELECT * FROM customer) cu, (SELECT * FROM chat WHERE date_time IN (SELECT MAX(date_time) FROM chat WHERE sender = 1 AND cust_id = #{custId} GROUP BY stu_id)) ch WHERE cu.cust_id=ch.cust_id) cuh WHERE cs.stuId = cuh.stuId ORDER BY cuh.dateTime DESC;
SELECT s.stu_id stuId, s.name stuName, c.com_id comId, c.name comName, c.logo_img comLogo FROM company c, (SELECT * FROM studio WHERE stu_id = #{stuId}) s WHERE c.com_id = s.com_id;
